bibl.title: Gem Index to Studies in Magical Amulets by Campbell Bonner.
bibl.note: Campbell BONNER, Studies in Magical Amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian = University of Michigan Studies. Humanistic Series. 49 (Ann Arbor, 1950): index des gemmes et de leur mention dans le texte.
